attributes.title: BOOGERMAN VS BOOGERMEISTER • Retroactive
attributes.caption: EAT MY BOOGERS!
attributes.description: We start a new series where we play retro games from our childhood. Aleks surprises James with one of the first games he's ever played when living in a Russian Prison Camp called Boogerman. Janitor by day Boogerman by night, he pretty much saves the world from evil with his super boogers and burps.

attributes.title: TINY TOON CHEATERS • Retroactive
attributes.caption: ​I HATE EVERYTHING BUT THE TASMANIAN DEVIL
attributes.description: Today's Retro game is Tiny Toon Adventures, Buster's Hidden Treasure, brought in by James and played by our good ole pal Aleks. They soon learn though the deep dark secrets of this piece and spiral into a manic insanity of feverish dreams and thoughts.

attributes.title: BEAVIS AND BUTT-HEAD • Retroactive
attributes.caption: GWAR! GWAR! GWAR! GWAR!
attributes.description: Today's Retro game is Beavis and Butt-Head, a game that James has loathed since childhood. Will they ever get their tickets to the GWAR concert?

attributes.title: GOLDEN AXE MEATBALL PRISONER • Retroactive
attributes.caption: SWEDISH MEATBALLS FOR EVERYBODY!
attributes.description: Subscribe: http://bit.ly/1RQtfNfCow Chop Merch: http://bit.ly/1U8HCxDRT First: http://bit.ly/2b4bWuWDiscuss: http://bit.ly/1qvrlLDTwitter: https://twitter.com/CowChopBeat Boxing Pro: http://bit.ly/1NdSvROToday's Retro game is Golden Axe 3. Another game from Aleks' childhood. James soon realizes though that his character in the game has a very dark and unfortunate past with a passion for Swedish Meatballs. The following is for those multicultural. Unë një herë mori boshti të fortë në vend. Kjo ishte një sëpatë artë. Kam marrë shumë ditë dhe netë të marrë. Unë kisha për të mbjellë 50 pemë të reja në terren dhe në fund kam marrë akset më të fuqishme. Ajo kurrë nuk do të thyejnë dhe më lejoni të prerë fruta sa më shumë që unë dua. Për fat të mirë për seri Sega Golden Axe ishte mbyllur, e cila lë më të fuqishme sëpatë artë weilding në të gjithë vendin. I dua kafshët kaluar.Siapa lagi yang mempunyai dinosaur haiwan peliharaan? Saya suka makan dinosaur asshole saya. Rasanya begitu baik. Rasa pantat dino hebat. Ini sebenarnya perkara kegemaran saya lakukan apabila saya lembaga atau lapar atau hanya mencari pengembaraan dalam hidup. Rasa najis berjalan ke dalam mulut saya dan ke dalam kerongkong saya ialah uncomparable untuk apa-apa lagi di dunia.Thank You

attributes.title: SHAQ FU CRUISE • Retroactive
attributes.caption: FREE CRUISE FOR TWO!
attributes.description: On this Retroactive, Aleks attempts finally play Taz-Mania until James realizes that the game is broken and they are forced to play another, Shaq Fu. The question is who is the Shaq master?

attributes.title: GLOVE ON BALLS • Retroactive
attributes.caption: HAVE YOU EVER SLAPPED SOMEONE WITH A GLOVE?
attributes.description: GLOVE ON BALLS • RetroactiveCow Chop Merch: http://bit.ly/1U8HCxDSubscribe: http://bit.ly/1RQtfNfRT First: http://bit.ly/2b4bWuWDiscuss: http://bit.ly/1qvrlLDTwitter: https://twitter.com/CowChopBeat Boxing Pro: http://bit.ly/1NdSvROOn this Retroactive, Aleks is introduced to Glover! A glove who has a ball to help him through the world. Though the platforming is a bit more difficult than Aleks ever imagined.

attributes.title: ALIEN INVASION • Retroactive
attributes.caption: SKIP THIS LEVEL
attributes.description: this episode, Aleks makes James play Alien 3, one of Aleks' favorite childhood video games. Or is it?

attributes.title: X-MEN SIMULATION • Retroactive
attributes.caption: MAGNETO OWNS THE MOON
attributes.description: Aleks and James team up to build their inner powers and save the universe in the classic hit X-Men for the Sega Genesis.
